title: Men's 500 m - Speed Skating St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 500 m 1928","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":null,"9":null,"10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"-","17":"-","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"-","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"-","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":"32.","37":"33.","38":null,"39":null,"40":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 500 m competition was held at the Badrutts Park and 33 athletes participated in the event.","41":null,"42":"These results for Men's 500 m - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","43":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 500 m 1928","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Bernt Evensen","6":"Clas Thunberg","7":"John O'Neil Farrell","8":"Jaako Friman","9":"Roald Larsen","10":"Haakon Pedersen","11":"Charles Gorman","12":"Bertel Backmann","13":"Oskar Olsen","14":"Edward Murphy","15":"William Logan","16":"Irving Jaffee","17":"Toivo Ovaska","18":"Ross Robinson","19":"Christfried Burmeister","20":"Alberts Rumba","21":"Valentine Bialas","22":"Fritz Moser","23":"Zoltan E\u00f6tv\u00f6s","24":"Friedrich Jungblut","25":"Otto Polacsek","26":"Aleksander Mitt","27":"Gustaf Andersson","28":"Rudolf Riedl","29":"Erhard Mayke","30":"Leon Quaglia","31":"Simon Heiden","32":"Keistutis Bulota","33":"Charles Thaon","34":"Frederick Dix","35":"Leonard Stewart","36":"Cyril Horn","37":"Willem Kos","38":null,"39":null,"40":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - St. Moritz 1928 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
